name: Idle Foodie Empire Tycoon
description:
Become the manager of your own Foodie Empire in this exciting and free idle food game!
Caution: this addictive incremental business simulation game can cause real culinary fever!

Sell your favourite food, buy new trucks, hire managers and influencers to do the work for you. Collect rewarding cards, expand to new worlds and build the greatest Foodie Empire! Make the right business decisions to optimize your cash flow, be smart and become a rich millionaire or even billionaire. And don't forget, if you make the right decisions, idle cash will make you rich, offline and online. You can tap to riches and boost your idle productivity to collect all gold, coins, money and cash! Unlike others, this idel game features very friendly and shiny characters that are nice to look at while they increase your profit. It's ok to be a food tycoon capitalist.

Start small and get big!

Start with a single truck and expand your food selection, your truck fleet and open a festival in every city.
Win the hearts of your customers by offering their favourite dishes!
This game will show you just how fast you can progress in your business if you work hard, stay focused and use the best simulation strategy. Become your own boss and create the best workflow and truck infrastructure. Invest in different mobile kitchens and hire managers to automate the cooking process. If you have the right skills you can get the wealthiest idle business manager in the world!

Complete quests and expand your business!

Complete Quests to prove you're the greatest business manager and get great rewards! Complete all quests to unlock new festival locations and expand your business to become the leading foodie empire manager! As you become a wealthy food tycoon your managers even help you with some goals in the background.

Sell your favourite products!

Select your offerings within a huge variety of drinks and foods, your kitchen, your rules! Invite your customers to visit you at your sushi bar truck or offer them some coffee at your cafe truck. Wheater you want to serve bubble tea, lemonade or pizza in your mobile restaurants, it's just one tap away.

Make the right business decisions!

Hire Influencers to boost your food trucks. But beware: influencers don't boost every product! Look out for the right # to boost your revenue.

FOODIE EMPIRE - IDLE STREET FOOD FESTIVAL TYCOON
- Complete Quests to unlock new festival locations and become the richest Foodie Manager!
- Automate your food festival staff to maximize your idle income: no annoying tap tap like in other online casual clicker required!
- Earn idle cash and generate money: Your Foodie Empire makes you rich even when you're offline!
- Smart Investments help you to boost your economy and win lots of rewards to get rich!
- Employ Managers to keep your workers motivated!
- Every influencer boosts different products. Hire them wisely to increase your productivity!
- Manage 20 beautiful locations and build up your foodie empire!
- Collect more than 30 Products, including Donuts, Pizza, Burgers, Tacos and much more!
- No internet required: Become the richest manager, online and offline!

Start building your foodie empire now and become the richest manager tycoon in this addictive online and offline strategy simulator!
